data.name: pattern_backup_created
data.value:
h1.Portal Backup Created
Dear $OwnerName,
A backup file containing data from your TeamLab portal has been created. It is available for download under the following link:
"$BackupUrl":"$BackupUrl"
The link will expire in $BackupHours hours.
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"

data.name: pattern_change_pwd
data.value:
h1.Password Changed
Dear $UserName,
Your password for your portal at "$__VirtualRootPath":"$__VirtualRootPath" has been changed.
Please find your log in details below:
Email: *_#SYS_RECIPIENT_ADDRESS#_* Password: *$Password*

data.name: pattern_confirm_owner_change
data.value:
h1.Change of Portal Owner
Dear $OwnerName,
A request to change the portal owner to $UserName has been made.
Please follow the link below to confirm the operation: "$ConfirmPortalOwnerUpdate":"$ConfirmPortalOwnerUpdate"
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"

data.name: pattern_dns_change
data.value:
h1.Change of Portal Address
Dear $OwnerName,
A request to change the portal address to "$PortalAddress":"$PortalAddress" #if($PortalDns != "") ("$PortalDns":"$PortalDns" )#end has been made.
Please follow the link below to confirm the operation: "$ConfirmDnsUpdate":"$ConfirmDnsUpdate"
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"

data.name: pattern_invite
data.value:
h1.Invitation to Join TeamLab Portal
Hello,
$__AuthorName has invited you to join an portal at Teamlab. TeamLab is a free platform for business collaboration and project management. Join your portal and start collaborating with your colleagues right away.
To accept the invitation please enter your name and password following this link: "$InviteLink":"$InviteLink"

data.name: pattern_join
data.value:
h1.Invitation to Join TeamLab Portal
Hello,
You have requested to join an portal at Teamlab. TeamLab is a free platform for business collaboration and project management. Join your portal and start collaborating with your colleagues right away.
To accept the invitation please enter your name and password following this link: "$InviteLink":"$InviteLink"

data.name: pattern_portal_deactivate
data.value:
h1.Account Deactivation
Dear $OwnerName,
You have requested a temporary deactivation of your TeamLab account. Please follow the link below to confirm the operation: "$DeactivateUrl":"$DeactivateUrl"
You can reactivate your account at any time by clicking the following link: "$ActivateUrl":"$ActivateUrl"
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"

data.name: pattern_portal_delete
data.value:
h1.Account Deletion
Dear $OwnerName,
You have requested to permanently delete your TeamLab account. Important! All the data stored on your portal, as well as your registration details will be lost and cannot be recovered.
Please follow the link below to confirm the operation: "$DeleteUrl":"$DeleteUrl"
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"

data.name: pattern_profile_updated
data.value:
h1.Profile Changed
Dear $UserName,
Your user profile at "$__VirtualRootPath":"$__VirtualRootPath" has been changed by "$__AuthorName":"$__AuthorUrl" .
To view your profile follow the link below: "$UserName":"$MyStaffLink"

data.name: pattern_pwd_reminder
data.value:
h1.Password Reminder
Dear $UserName,
You have requested a password reminder for your portal at "$__VirtualRootPath":"$__VirtualRootPath" .
Please find your log in details below:
Email: *_#SYS_RECIPIENT_ADDRESS#_* Password: *$Password*

data.name: pattern_self_profile_updated
data.value:
h1.Profile Change Notification
"$__AuthorName":"$__AuthorUrl" has changed his/her profile details at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" .

data.name: pattern_send_whats_new
data.value:
h1.What's New for $Date
#foreach($activity in $Activities)
h2.$activity.Key
#foreach($whatsNewActivity in $activity.Value)
#foreach($b in $whatsNewActivity.BreadCrumbs) *$b* > #end "$whatsNewActivity.Title":"$whatsNewActivity.URL"
"$whatsNewActivity.UserName":"$whatsNewActivity.UserAbsoluteURL" $whatsNewActivity.Date.ToShortTimeString()
#end #end
Your portal address: "$__VirtualRootPath":"$__VirtualRootPath"
"Edit subscription settings":"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL"

data.name: pattern_user_has_join
data.value:
h1.New User Added
"$__AuthorName":"$__AuthorUrl" has joined your portal at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" .

data.name: pattern_you_added
data.value:
h1.Welcome to TeamLab!
Dear $UserName,
Your user profile has been added by $__AuthorName to your portal at TeamLab.
TeamLab is a free platform for business collaboration and project management. To access your portal follow the link "$__VirtualRootPath":"$__VirtualRootPath" and start collaborating with your colleagues right away.
Please find your log in details below:
Email: *_#SYS_RECIPIENT_ADDRESS#_* Password: *$Password*
You can change your password once you log into your portal.
h3.Get started with your portal
# "Edit your profile":"$MyStaffLink" to add personal and contact details. # "Enter Community":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/community/" to post in your blog, add events, photos, and more. # "Enter Projects":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/projects/" to create your project and manage it by adding milestones and tasks. # "Start Talk":"${__VirtualRootPath}/talk/" to chat with your team members online.
If you need help with your portal, we invite you to browse our "How-to guides":"http://teamlab.com/howto.aspx" . For any additional questions or feedback please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"

data.name: pattern_you_added_after_invite
data.value:
h1.Welcome to TeamLab!
Dear $UserName,
Your user profile has been successfully added to the portal at "$__VirtualRootPath":"$__VirtualRootPath" .
Please find your log in details below:
Email: *_#SYS_RECIPIENT_ADDRESS#_* Password: *$Password*
h3.Get started with your portal
# "Edit your profile":"$MyStaffLink" to add personal and contact details. # "Enter Community":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/community/" to post in your blog, add events, photos, and more. # "Enter Projects":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/projects/" to create your project and manage it by adding milestones and tasks. # "Start Talk":"${__VirtualRootPath}/talk/" to chat with your team members online.
If you need help with your portal, we invite you to browse our "How-to guides":"http://teamlab.com/howto.aspx" . For any additional questions or feedback please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"
